title: Bonus Dive: Vaccination Hesitation w/ Dr. Kate Grossman
description:
On this very special bonus episode of The Deep Dive, June welcomes Dr. Kate Grossman to give us the 4-1-1 on the Covid-19 vaccine, it's safety and efficacy rates, and helps dispel disinformation around getting vaccinated. We hope this helps anyone who is unsure about getting vaccinated feel more educated and empowered to do so.

For more information on getting vaccinated go to www.vaccines.gov
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (June Diane Rapheal, Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair)
